EmailTemplate.name: Nurture Chat Soon - Day 70
EmailTemplate.subject: Re: Letâ€™s keep in touch! Was so nice to meet you
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
Are you still interested in discussing how Luxury Presence can take your online presence to the next level?
If you're not ready to connect right now, no problem. I'll go ahead and archive your file, but please know that our team is here to empower you in your local real estate market and help you unlock your fullest potential whenever you're ready.
We're dedicated to providing the best digital marketing tools and services to help real estate agents succeed. Your online presence is a direct reflection of how clients and prospects view your business, so we're here to make sure you make a great impression.
Best regards, {!User.Name}
